dcterms:creator: A. Klementiev
D. Roth
dcterms:description: A freely available comparable news corpus containing 2327 BBC messages from the time period from 1 January 2001 to 10 May 2005, along with their approximate translations from the Lenta.ru website.
dcterms:title: Comparable News Corpus

dcterms:creator: A. Klementiev
D. Roth
dcterms:description: A test corpus of 64 Russian-language documents used for evaluating the performance of the Russian-language IE system in the security scenario.
dcterms:title: Test Corpus for Security Scenario

dcterms:creator: A. Klementiev
D. Roth
dcterms:description: A test corpus of 75 Russian-language documents used for evaluating the performance of the Russian-language IE system in the epidemics scenario.
dcterms:title: Test Corpus for Epidemics Scenario
